title: Black HD Watch Face
summary: Black is the new white! A minimal watchface & battery saving watchface.
developerAddress:
83 Roseville Road
Office 20 Suite: #99589
Leeds, West Yorkshire
LS8 5DT
description: By installing "Black HD Watch Face" you'll get the watch face on your wrist and a companion app on your mobile device which will let you configure the watch face.Some of the options and features are:  ✔ Phone disconnection vibration ✔ Different watch vibration modes ✔ Option to let your wrist vibrate every hour like a cuckoo clock ✔ Ability to customize colors using different blending modesSupported devices: ✔ Motorola Moto 360 ✔ LG G Watch ✔ LG G Watch R ✔ Samsung Gear LIVE (not for Gear or Gear 2) ✔ Sony SmartWatch 3 ✔ Asus ZenWatchDoes NOT WORK on Samsung GEAR, GEAR 2 and smart watches with other operating systems like Tizen. descriptionHTML:
By installing "Black HD Watch Face" you'll get the watch face on your wrist and a companion app on your mobile device which will let you configure the watch face.

Some of the options and features are:

✔ Phone disconnection vibration
✔ Different watch vibration modes
✔ Option to let your wrist vibrate every hour like a cuckoo clock
✔ Ability to customize colors using different blending modes

Supported devices:
✔ Motorola Moto 360
✔ LG G Watch
✔ LG G Watch R
✔ Samsung Gear LIVE (not for Gear or Gear 2)
✔ Sony SmartWatch 3
✔ Asus ZenWatch

Does NOT WORK on Samsung GEAR, GEAR 2 and smart watches with other operating systems like Tizen.

Never leave your phone behind ANYMORE!!!

With a single tap you can enable the option to let your wrist vibrate whenever the connection between your phone and your Android Wear device gets disconnected.

How to install:
- Long press on your Android Wear device and select this watchface from the carousel.
- You can also select our watchface from the Android Wear App.

If you don't see it in the carousel:
- Wait a minute to let your Android Wear device to sync.
- Lauch Android Wear app, tap on the gear in the upper right corner and tap on "Resync apps" and wait for resync.

Visit our other watchfaces and apps at: http://goo.gl/kxZzQA

Have an idea on how to improve the app?Let us know by contacting us and we'll do our best to make you happy.
comments: Consideration Rather than have a bright high beam on during say.....a movie or other activities that require consideration for blinding or distracting others, this is something I use. Great that I can change in a tic. I will use other features as well. Hey, I WILL GET POINTS IF I PUT THE SIGNIFICANT OTHER ON MY TIMEPIECE, CAN'T WAIT. =]×>
A watch face that leaves notifications? No. Uninstalling. Not supporting such horrible decisions. And what was the ad? To follow you guys on Facebook? Just awful.
Notifications ads? Nope! Not doing anything with your products!

I love the look of this face but I wish you could add "widgets" for phone + watch battery, weather, etc that look like they're embossed into the leather (like on Zenwatch 3 "signature"). Also needs brown color option for brown leather look
